solution_line_template: The total weight of {num_bags} bags of lemons is {num_bags} x {mass_per_bag} = <<{num_bags}*{mass_per_bag}={total_weight}>>{total_weight} kilograms.
So, {max_truck_load} - {total_weight} = <<{max_truck_load}-{total_weight}={remaining_capacity}>>{remaining_capacity} kilograms can still be loaded into the truck.
